description: This file defines API routes for interacting with Jira issues, including fetching a specific issue by key and searching issues via JQL, using FastAPI framework.

classes.name: JiraClient
classes.description: Client interface for Jira API interactions, such as fetching issues and searching issues.

methods.name: JiraClient get_client()
methods.description: Provides a JiraClient instance configured with current settings.

methods.name: get_issue( key: str, client: JiraClient = Depends(get_client), _: None = Depends(get_auth_dependency(get_settings())), )
methods.description: API route handler to fetch a Jira issue by key.

methods.name: search_issues( payload: JiraSearchRequest, client: JiraClient = Depends(get_client), _: None = Depends(get_auth_dependency(get_settings())), )
methods.description: API route handler to perform a Jira issue search with JQL.

ctags.name: get_issue
ctags.signature: ( key: str, client: JiraClient = Depends(get_client), _: None = Depends(get_auth_dependency(get_settings())), )

ctags.name: search_issues
ctags.signature: ( payload: JiraSearchRequest, client: JiraClient = Depends(get_client), _: None = Depends(get_auth_dependency(get_settings())), )
